summary: Five Yorkshiremen try to survive after the British Rail is bought out by a private company.
cast: Dean Andrews|Thomas Craig|Joe Duttine|Steve Huison|Venn Tracey|Andy Swallow|Sean Glenn|Charlie Brown|Juliet Bates|John Aston|Graham Heptinstall|Angela Forrest|Clare McSwain|Megan Topham|Abigail Pearson|Charlotte Hukin|Jamie Widowson|Andy Oldham|Nigel Harrison|Charles Armstrong|Sue Robbie|Sue Thompson|Betty Noble|Charlie Wathen|John Roy|Kevin Carroll|Tim Cooper|Max Lemon|Tony Nyland|Gerry McMahon|Tony Maskell|Mike Wattam|Paul André|Neil Baggot|Ian Best|Stuart Brierley|Kevin Broadhead|Matt Brown|Wayne Clark|Glyn Davis|John Earl|Ken Ellis|Graham Heath|Kris Hitchen|Philip Johns|Pete Martin|Gary Maycock|Paul Morris|Steven Mowatt|Austin Wagstaff|Peter Wardlow|Jonathan Bridge|Jason Croot|Joe Gradwell
title: La cuadrilla
